name: Project Archerygic
description:
WARNING:this game contains many flashing and frantic lights, I do not advise ANYONE with epilepsy to play this game!

takes place in a universe, where magic reigns, but.. all humans have been trapped by their own creation, or turned into monsters, you are the LAST human in the world, and your goal is to free others.

combine different spells to get crazy and powerful results, you can only carry 7 spells in your magic bow, so... SOMETIMES IT'S JUST WORTH RISKING IT ALL

as the theme of the jam is: "sometimes it's worth risking everything", the idea is the following: risk picking up items to try to make the best combination possible among the 119 combinations! or... 85 on hard mode!

ROLL, rolling is good for escaping from risky situations, or dodging an attack!

shoot the start board to start the wave!

credits:
